}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :[http://www2.proxim.com/products/enterprise-wireless-lan-wi-fi-mesh/orinocor-client-products/orinocor-80211abgn-usb-adapter Product Page] (P/N: AM/C1080-US)
"DNUA01 S0B 2007/12/12" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :[http://proximtechnicalservice.com/support/orinoco/8494-xx/V2.1.0/ORiNOCO_8494_v2.1.0.zip Windows drivers] (use bugmenot.com to look up a valid login)
This device looks to be identical to: *[[Unex DNUA-81]] {{•}} [http://www.unex.com.tw/product/dnua-81 PPage] *[[Lancom Airlancer USB-300agn]] {{•}} [https://www.lancom-systems.de/produkte/wireless-lan/zubehoer/airlancer-usb-300agn/ PPage] *[[Ekahau NIC-300 USB]]
